Name: Beer Tree Trippy Tree
Description: Beer Tree Trippy Tree - Pineapple, Passion Fruit, Tangerine - The Beer Tree crew loaded this far out Fruited Sour with a triple threat of sun kissed deliciousness: pineapple, pink guava, and tangerine. They all come together for a trifecta of tangy taste that really gets the taste buds singing. Add a kiss of lactose from milk sugars.

Name: Delirium Noel
Description: Delirium Noel is a seasonal, Belgian Strong Dark Ale brewed by the Huyghe Brewery for the winter holidays, known for its dark red color and festive flavors of dark fruit, cinnamon, and clove. It's a top-fermented, bottle-conditioned beer with a creamy texture and a spicy, dry finish.

Name: Devils Backbone Lager
Description: Devils Backbone Vienna Lager It is an amber lager characterized by mild, toasted, and caramel malt notes, with a smooth, medium-bodied, and semi-sweet flavor profile.

Name: Duchesse Cherry Chocolate
Description: Duchesse Chocolate Cherry from the Verhaeghe Brewery is traditional Duchesse de Bourgogne -- a blend of 1 and 2 year old sour ales aged in oak casks -- with 20 kg of whole sour cherries from the Limburg region of Belgium added to each 100 liters of the maturing beer, along with chocolate essence. The brew pours a clear, dark reddish brown with a small pinkish tan head, and emanates aromas of tart sour cherries, bread, cocoa, toffee, and vanilla. On the palate, the predominant taste is cherry and chocolate, with a not-too-sweet chocolate aftertaste.

Name: Hoegaarden
Description: Hoegaarden is a Belgian wheat beer (witbier) from the village of Hoegaarden, famous for its cloudy appearance and refreshing taste from ingredients like orange peel and coriander. It is a popular style with a history dating back centuries.

Name: Kronenbourg Blanc
Description: Kronenbourg Blanc is a French wheat beer (witbier) with a pale, hazy golden color and a creamy white head. It is known for its refreshing and fruity flavor profile, which includes notes of citrus and spices like coriander, balanced by a mild bitterness and a smooth, wheat-based body. It has aromas of citrus, wheat, and a subtle spice, with a finish that is smooth and creamy with persistent fruity and citrus notes.

Name: Mast Landing Nitro Gunner's Daughter
Description: Mast Landing â€“ Gunner's Daughter NITRO Brewed with natural flavors to evoke flavors of peanut butter, coffee, and chocolate, without any of those ingredients; nut free, contains lactose.

Name: Other Half DDH All Citra Everything
Description: Other Half All Citra Everything is a double dry hopped imeperial India pale ale. It is a hazy Imperial IPA highlighting a single hop variety, Citra. Notes of lychee and sweet orange.

Name: St. Bernardus Tripel
Description: St. Bernardus Tripel is a well-regarded Belgian abbey ale known for its balanced blend of sweetness and hop bitterness, with a crisp, effervescent mouthfeel. Reviewers frequently mention aromas and flavors of spicy fruit, citrus, banana, and clove, with a clean malt base and often a hint of caramel.

Name: Weldwerks Extra Extra Juicy Bits
Description: WeldWerks Extra Extra Juicy Bits features a profile bursting with tropical and citrus fruits, such as mango, pineapple, passion fruit, and tangerine, balanced by a grapefruit finish and a low, soft bitterness. Its flavor is supported by a creamy, smooth, and pillowy mouthfeel from oats and wheat.
